Source.Name: rio
Source.Summary: A hardware-accelerated GPU terminal emulator powered by WebGPU
Source.Description: Rio is a hardware-accelerated GPU terminal emulator powered by WebGPU, focusing on running in desktops and browsers. It aims to provide a beautiful and fast terminal experience with features like tabs, split panes, and extensive theming options.
